name: ReDeath
description:
ReDeath is a puzzle platformer where the player must solve the levels using time loops. When the player dies a clone is created that repeats the exact movements of the player.
The player must work together with its clones to reach the end of the level.

Controls:
A:  Move Left
D: Move Right
W: Jump

(Press Q on the level select to unlock all levels
Press W on the level select to reset progress)
